heading: This Afternoon
temperature: Low to mid 20s north, mid to upper 20s south

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mainly clear, some high clouds.  Colder.
temperature: 5 above to 10 below, teens below in cold spots.

heading: Saturday
text: Snow slowly tapering off west to east; increasing winds.
temperature: 0 to 10 north, teens to low 20s south, falling
